str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
From the base of peran; properly, through, i.e. Around; figuratively with respect to; used in various applications, of place, cause or time.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Genitive Neuter Plural
Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: A primary verb; to 'grave', especially to write; figuratively, to describe.
Properly, beautiful, but chiefly good, i.e. Valuable or virtuous.
Prop: I fasten to; I lay hold of, touch, know carnally. Reflexive of hapto; properly, to attach oneself to, i.e. To touch.
